author: fdmanana
msg: Don't check for a progress of 100%. Because the number of
documents the test writes is variable, sometimes the progress
is below 100% (99, 98 for e.g.) due to integer division
This is a backport of revision 1172423 from trunk.

author: fdmanana
msg: Don't check for a progress of 100%. Because the number of
documents the test writes is variable, sometimes the progress
is below 100% (99, 98 for e.g.) due to integer division
